name: Keralamangalyam
description: Welcome to the official android application of KeralaMangalyam.com, the most trusted matrimony portal for the Malayalee community around the world.    We welcome you to the unbeatable performance of our application with an easy to use interface. It will make your partner search an easy and relaxed experience online! We have a list of interesting features that will help you quicken your partner search.     Simply register and create your profile for FREE right within the App.     Upload photos /set password for photos FREE   Search for partners of your choice from a huge list of Kerala brides/grooms.   Refine your search results based on your social, religious, personal and other  preferences to narrow down on profiles that you wish to shortlist.     View profiles, photos, phone numbers of Malayali brides and grooms.   Short list interested profiles and save for later.     Compare between selected profiles and find the best.     Send interest messages to selected profiles for FREE and get their reply through the app.   Stay connected with prospective Kerala matches on-the-go.   Happy to help customer support to assist you with your partner search.   Be assured that your information will be kept private with us.    We are looking forward to deliver you a better personalised match making service and improved result oriented service through this.  Celebrated by Malayalee brides and grooms all over the world as the most credible and user friendly matrimony portal for their Kerala wedding, we have been endeared as the first choice of parents who seek a perfect partner for their children. Malayali brides and grooms from all districts in Kerala use this service for their Kerala Matrimony service. KeralaMangalyam.com takes on the responsibility to obey Indian marital laws and regulations. We do not allow chatting facility and is not at all a platform for dating or just fun. We warmly welcome all Malayalee parents who are seriously looking for marriage for their children.  We strive to make sure the genuineness of our profiles through manual verification process and thus all the registered proposals are filtered and all the contact numbers are verified. Also we guarantee the privacy of each member in our site. Our responsible and responsive support team will give you a family like feeling for the most important occasion of your family!  Added with ELITE SERVICE, our relationship managers are at your service with more personalised service.  Register FREE, search according to your preferences, find out your preferred alliances, contact them and get married! Reasonable packages and no commission or brokerage!  All activities done on your mobile will be seamlessly integrated with the site. Download now, register and get started! We wish you all the very best on your partner search.
